column5: Looks like Shimano will be re-doing/adding a bunch of new rods and reels this year at ICAST and our boy Dave added some fuel to the fire with some recent pics on Facebook. And if you like the current Curado E series reels, Stradic FI reels, and the Crucial rods then nows the time to pick some up on sale because soon they'll be gone...   Rumour Mill
I bet that is why the curado's are on sale right now too.
Where are the curados on sale? I think I need one.  Slayer
I think you need one too Simon. Mine is hands down the best reel i have ever owned.
The BPS website has the 200 size on sale right now but I suspect they'll put the rest of the sizes on sale soon too. Lots of other online stores are starting to put them on sale...
yup, BPS has them on for $159 or in that range. I'm still not sure why the US stores are $139. when our $ is better then the USA $.
I believe fishing world in hamilton is selling them for $159
Maybe everyone is just reailzing how over rated they are and over priced lol
